creator: yair.glikman@rtc-vision.com
text:
I know its a meess, 
I am using x64 4.2.16 bit version from apachehaus VC11

and modules 64bit modules from 64 edge server. (I need subversiom modules)

I have an unresovled issue for a year now, since we have upgrated to subversion 1.8, sometimes the client hangs on operation for 60 sec or more and releases, i allways tought it belongs to LDAP.

1. I pretty sure LDAPConnectionPoolTTL is not beeing honored

why?
logs does not show its loaded
[Fri Oct 09 12:25:53.705113 2015] [ssl:info] [pid 3056:tid 352] AH01876: mod_ssl/2.4.16 compiled against Server: Apache/2.4.16, Library: OpenSSL/1.0.1p
[Fri Oct 09 12:25:53.736314 2015] [ldap:debug] [pid 3056:tid 352] util_ldap.c(2155): AH01297: ldap cache: Setting shared memory cache size to 1000000 bytes.
[Fri Oct 09 12:25:53.736314 2015] [ldap:debug] [pid 3056:tid 352] util_ldap.c(2227): AH01300: ldap cache: Setting search cache size to 1024 entries.
[Fri Oct 09 12:25:53.736314 2015] [ldap:debug] [pid 3056:tid 352] util_ldap.c(2203): AH01299: ldap cache: Setting cache TTL to 300000000 microseconds.
[Fri Oct 09 12:25:53.736314 2015] [ldap:debug] [pid 3056:tid 352] util_ldap.c(2272): AH01302: ldap cache: Setting operation cache size to 1024 entries.
[Fri Oct 09 12:25:53.736314 2015] [ldap:debug] [pid 3056:tid 352] util_ldap.c(2248): AH01301: ldap cache: Setting operation cache TTL to 300000000 microseconds.


2) is there a way to avoid AH01626, eg "AH01626: authorization result of Require valid-user : denied" on ldap login ?
Basically, the ldap login works, but before eeveery login i get denied first.

log:
[Fri Oct 09 02:26:42.990888 2015] [authz_svn:info] [pid 8312:tid 2496] [client 192.168.10.22:50319] Access granted: 'builder' REPORT MAMA:
[Fri Oct 09 02:26:42.990888 2015] [authz_core:debug] [pid 8312:tid 2496] mod_authz_core.c(806): [client 192.168.10.22:50319] AH01626: authorization result of Require valid-user : denied (no authenticated user yet)
[Fri Oct 09 02:26:42.990888 2015] [authz_core:debug] [pid 8312:tid 2496] mod_authz_core.c(806): [client 192.168.10.22:50319] AH01626: authorization result of <RequireAny>: denied (no authenticated user yet)
[Fri Oct 09 02:26:42.990888 2015] [authnz_ldap:debug] [pid 8312:tid 2496] mod_authnz_ldap.c(515): [client 192.168.10.22:50319] AH01691: auth_ldap authenticate: using URL ldap://127.0.0.1:389/CN=Users,DC=MAMA,DC=local?sAMAccountName?sub?(objectClass=user)
[Fri Oct 09 02:26:42.990888 2015] [authnz_ldap:debug] [pid 8312:tid 2496] mod_authnz_ldap.c(612): [client 192.168.10.22:50319] AH01697: auth_ldap authenticate: accepting builder
[Fri Oct 09 02:26:42.990888 2015] [authz_svn:debug] [pid 8312:tid 2496] mod_authz_svn.c(441): [client 192.168.10.22:50319] Path to authz file is D:/SVN/svnaccessfile
[Fri Oct 09 02:26:42.990888 2015] [authz_svn:info] [pid 8312:tid 2496] [client 192.168.10.22:50319] Access granted: 'builder' GET MAMA:/trunk/Infra/Layer2_Pub

creator: covener@gmail.com
text:
Only the cache settings are echoed at startup, so I don't think there's any real symptom there.  Do you have any traces/packet captures that show a connection being reused when it should have been aged out?

For the other q&a, use users@httpd.apache.org not bugzilla
